Translations.Text: Dictus Roam terra note consequences rejectors

Dictus, "To whom belongs everything caelum terra? Dictus, "To DEUS. He decretum mercy est His attribute He surely summon vos totus Feria Resurrection est inevitable. Unus lose their anima est those disbelieve
To Eum belongs everything dwells in nox feria! He est Hearer Knower
dictus Shall ego accept DEUS prout Dominus Magister when He est Initiator de caelum terra He feeds non fed Dictus ego commanded the multus devoted submitter non est idol worshiper
dictus ego fear si ego disobeyed my Dominus retribution awesome feria
Whoever spared (retribution) ut feria attained His mercy! Hoc est major triumph
Deus touches vos adversity nullus relieve it absque He. Ac si He touches vos beatus He est Omnipotent
He est Supreme His creatures. He est the Multus Wise Cognizant

Dictus Whose testimony est major? Dictus deus! He est testis me vos ut hoc Quran inspired me preach it vos whomever it reaches Indeed vos bear testis ibi est alius deus DEUS. Dictus ego non juro prout vos perfecit; ibi est unus unus deus ego disown tuus idolatry
Those nos dedit scripture recognize hoc prout they recognize their suus infans. Unus lose their anima est those non believe
